reference.title: C++ topic types
reference.shortdesc: The C++ API specialization provides a set of specific topic types that can describe a C++ application programming interface (API) library. The C++ language-specific API topic types are specialized from the generic API reference topic types. This specialization permits the sharing of the basic semantics and processing.

section.title: Description
section.p: The C++ modules describe the C++ topic types and their contained elements. For example, the cxxClass module describes all the elements necessary to describe a C++ class.
